channel.title: Motor controllers
channel.description: We have been using Spark Motor Controllers in most of our builds. I see that Rev Robotics lists them as out of stock currently, and we have two wild things that lack only that part to be completed. Does anyone have a suggestion for a direct replacement? Thank you!

item.title: Motor controllers
item.dc:creator: Mattnauman
item.description:
I just looked into those. Thank you for the suggestion. I am going to order one and let the team try it out.

Read full topic

item.title: Motor controllers
item.dc:creator: Pete-from-POP
item.description:
have you heard of the Sabertooth from Dimension Engineering? We use the 32amp version and it seems to work pretty well

Read full topic
